document.full_text: belgium reacted with shock on friday when a disgraced former bishop revealed that he had abused two nephews but said he did not consider himself a pedophile.
document.title: outrage in belgium over interview of ex-bishop
lines_and_colors: belgium reacted with shock on friday when a disgraced former bishop revealed that he had abused two nephews but said he did not consider himself a pedophile.
